events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Your case has been assigned to an available customer service agent to assist you with your refund.
Hello, Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide the order number?
Can you also send a photo of the product you received to verify the issue for the refund process?
Sure, the order number is 12345678 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong item that was shipped.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response! I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund case has been resolved. Please contact us if you experience any further issues.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
We are closing this case as your refund has been processed successfully and no further action is needed.
